option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Night variant: flatter, low-contrast noise-friendly gradient without intrusive shapes --> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Subtle vertical gradient using surface containers --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <gradient android:type="linear" android:startColor="@color/md_theme_surfaceContainerHigh" android:centerColor="@color/md_theme_surfaceContainer" android:endColor="@color/md_theme_surfaceDim" android:angle="180" /> </shape> </item>
<!-- Faint top accent fade (primary container tint) --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <gradient android:startColor="#33425E91" <!-- translucent primary --> android:endColor="#00000000" android:angle="180" /> <size android:height="200dp" /> </shape> </item>
<!-- Radial glow behind illustration (soft primary) --> <item> <shape android:shape="oval"> <size android:width="600dp" android:height="600dp" /> <gradient android:type="radial" android:gradientRadius="300dp" android:startColor="#26425E91" android:endColor="#00294677" /> </shape> <gravity android:gravity="top|center_horizontal" /> <padding android:top="140dp" /> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/card_background" /> <corners android:radius="16dp" /> <stroke android:width="0.5dp" android:color="@color/light_gray" /> </shape>

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <font-family xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="200" android:font="@font/jakarta_extra_light" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="300" android:font="@font/jakarta_light" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="400" android:font="@font/jakarta_regular" /> <font android:fontStyle="italic" android:fontWeight="400" android:font="@font/jakarta_italic" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="500" android:font="@font/jakarta_medium" /> <font android:fontStyle="italic" android:fontWeight="500" android:font="@font/jakarta_medium_italic" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="600" android:font="@font/jakarta_semibold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="700" android:font="@font/jakarta_bold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="800" android:font="@font/jakarta_extra_bold" /> </font-family>
